mapper.select:
select
distinct
from jk_loan_repay_general
order by ${orderByClause}
select sum(t1.use_amount) as loan_amount,count(1) as loan_quantity from jk_loan_limit t1 where t1.uid =#{uid} and t1.status in (2,3) and t1.tenant <> 'dl'

select if(sum(t1.penalty_interest_amount) is null,0,sum(t1.penalty_interest_amount)) from jk_loan_repay_general t1, jk_loan_apply t2 where t1.apply_loan_id= t2.id and t1.uid = ${uid} and t1.status <> 2 and t2.order_no is null
